front.title: One-way delay measurement method based on Digital Twin Network

abstract.t: This document implements an accurate network delay measurement method based on the digital twin network. This method does not need to send measurement packets, change the physical network configuration, change the format of service packets, and do not require physical network elements to support the time synchronization protocol. Two- way delay and one-way delay measurement of any service packet.The digital twin network architecture of this document follows the NMRG working group paper draft-irtf-nmrg-network-digital-twin-arch-00.
